Is familial paroxysmal kinesigenic dyskinesia inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern. Autosomal dominant inheritance means that one copy of an altered gene in each cell is sufficient to cause the disorder. In most cases, an affected person has one parent with the condition.",GHR,familial paroxysmal kinesigenic dyskinesia
